Key Match Events: Sri Lanka beat Afghanistan by 6 wickets to win their 2nd match in the tournament.
Hasaranga, who was the player of the match, picked up a three-wicket haul and restricted Afghanistan to 144.
A valuable partnership between Dhananjaya de Silva and Charith Asalanka sealed the deal for Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka chased down the total with 9 balls remaining.
Post-Match Reflections: With the win, Sri Lanka moved to third position in the table with four points in four matches.
Afghanistan are out of the qualification race for the semi-finals.
